Package org.fridlund.javalabra.game.utils

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FontLoader
    A static class, containing all the Fonts that the game could like to use.
    TextureLoader
    Handles the OpenGL binding for textures or images.
    Timer
    Makes the game update with a defined FPS, allowing your game to be run on whatever system, independently of the specifications of that system.

    Enum Description
